Reviews.Title: Very good point and shoot compact camera especially for $100
Reviews.Author: Keith Hawkins "keith15"
Reviews.Content: This is a very good point and shoot camera with a cool 16:9 12mp feature to capture still images that fill the widescreen TV format. If you don't want to spend the money or have the need for the drop-proof, water-proof, etc.-proof WG series from Pentax, this fits-in-your-pocket camera is ideal. Yes, this is not a DSLR, but try to fit the K-5 in your pocket.

ProductInfo.Name: Pentax Optio LS465 Compact Camera, Ruby Pink US 14071
